Title: 55. Preparing surprise
Text:
Undead have encampment at the foot of mountainside directly east from spring of Ramshorne river.
I will find it when I travel to the west from Musk's camp until I get to the foot of the mountainside, from where I should travel north and keep my altitude.

My mission is to find a way in to the fortress.
I will receive reinforcements at the very moment I find a way in, or I get into trouble.
